tag_list: prosper-inc, prosper-scam, prospering-scam, prospering-inc-reviews, utah, provo, salt-lake-city, money, business, education, analysis, investing, entrepreneurship, e-commerce, personal-finance, personal-development
overview:
Since its inception, Prosper served with one important mission: To help our students and partners to prosper. Our track record speaks for itself: We have mentored more than 50,000 students in more than 80 countries, while supporting and enhancing our partners’ brands.

By distilling the philosophies of our expert partners into structured curricula; providing one-on-one coaching; and focusing on results rather than theory, we help our students develop entrepreneurial skills, get out of debt, develop added sources of revenue, and more.

Prosper was founded in 1999, and since then has become one of the most trusted name in one-to-one personalized education. Prosper currently focuses its offerings on real estate and stock market investing, entrepreneurship, e-commerce, personal finance, and personal development. What sets us apart is that we work closely with some of the world’s most recognized experts in these disciplines, including Robert Allen, Joe Vitale, Nightingale Conant, John Cummuta, Stephen Pierce, Ken Blanchard, Bob Gatchel, David Bach, and Stephen Cooper.

We are committed to helping people realize their potential and achieve a better life through our customized education programs. Our reputation for producing blockbuster results continues to attract some of the biggest names in business today. We look forward to partnering with you.
